1.0.name: wordpress/clply
1.0.description:
PLEASE USE http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/curateus/ INSTEAD.

Adding the "Clip This" button gives your readers the ability to share your content across the web while giving you the ability to see how and where your content is used. When a reader creates a clip or formatted quote of your content, attribution to your original work is automatically added with links back to the source.
